mapper.insert: INSERT INTO animal_profiles (shelter_id, name, species, breed,gender,age,health_status,description,image_url,status,created_at) VALUES (#{shelterId}, #{animalname}, #{species}, #{breed},#{gender},#{age},#{healthStatus},#{description},#{imgUrl},0,NOW());
mapper.select: SELECT ap.id, ap.shelter_id AS shelterId, ap.name, ap.species, ap.breed, ap.gender, ap.age, ap.health_status AS healthStatus, ap.description, ap.image_url AS imageUrl, ap.status, CASE WHEN ap.status = 0 THEN '待审核' WHEN ap.status = 1 THEN '可领养' WHEN ap.status = 2 THEN '已领养' WHEN ap.status = 3 THEN '审核不通过' ELSE '未知状态' END AS status_str, ap.created_at AS createdAt, ap.updated_at AS updatedAt, s.shelter_name AS shelterName, s.contact_person AS contactPerson FROM animal_profiles ap JOIN shelters s ON ap.shelter_id = s.id;

SELECT ap.id, ap.shelter_id AS shelterId, ap.name, ap.species, ap.breed, ap.gender, ap.age, ap.health_status AS healthStatus, ap.description, ap.image_url AS imageUrl, ap.status, CASE WHEN ap.status = 0 THEN '待审核' WHEN ap.status = 1 THEN '可领养' WHEN ap.status = 2 THEN '已领养' WHEN ap.status = 3 THEN '审核不通过' ELSE '未知状态' END AS status_str, ap.created_at AS createdAt, ap.updated_at AS updatedAt, s.shelter_name AS shelterName, s.contact_person AS contactPerson FROM animal_profiles ap JOIN shelters s ON ap.shelter_id = s.id LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
